results.title: The Tattoo
results.creator_credit: Michael Burnside, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The story of Michael Burnside’s dad’s tattoo encompasses a far broader history of family, migration, separation and life of a man who has come a long way.

results.title: To Sevek
results.brief_description: Mark tells the tragic story of his brother, who fled Poland as a child during WWII but later died in Uzbekistan. Produced during a general Public Digital Storytelling workshop.

results.title: My new home
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Jaya Sharma
results.brief_description: A story of a young woman’s life journey - from a young bride in India to become the head of Hindi radio at SBS in Melbourne. Created in the ACMI ‘Diversity@Work’ Digital Storytelling program in association with Diversity @ Work, AMES, Australia POst and SBS.
results.description: A story of a young woman’s life journey - from a young bride in India to become the head of Hindi radio at SBS in Melbourne. Created in the ACMI ‘Diversity@Work’ Digital Storytelling program in association with Diversity @ Work, AMES, Australia POst and SBS.

results.title: River of my Life
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Amira Sabanovic
results.brief_description: A digital story made as part of the ‘Diversity @ Work’ Program in association with AMES, Australia Post and SBS. Amira describes the course her life has taken - from the ravages of War in her homeland through to the hardships of a refugee’s life in both Europe and Australia before finding acceptance and fulfillment through a supportive workplace.
results.description: A digital story made as part of the ‘Diversity @ Work’ Program in association with AMES, Australia Post and SBS. Amira describes the course her life has taken - from the ravages of War in her homeland through to the hardships of a refugee’s life in both Europe and Australia before finding acceptance and fulfillment through a supportive workplace.
description_for_label: A digital story made as part of the ‘Diversity @ Work’ Program in association with AMES, Australia Post and SBS. Amira describes the course her life has taken - from the ravages of War in her homeland through to the hardships of a refugee’s life in both Europe and Australia before finding acceptance and fulfillment through a supportive workplace.

results.title: Fay's story
results.brief_description: ‘As March comes around each year I look back with nostalgia at this journey as the first Sun Queen of Moomba’. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Festival.

results.title: A Moomba Magic Moment
results.brief_description: It all started with my promotional photo and my girlfriend Gail Gordon, she entered me into the Moomba Quest, and the rest is history. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Fest.

results.title: Moomba belonged to my grandfather
results.brief_description: Moomba belonged to my grandfather, Tom Wittingslow. Of all the shows and carnivals we did all over Australia, Moomba was the best. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Festival.
results.description: Moomba belonged to my grandfather, Tom Wittingslow. Of all the shows and carnivals we did all over Australia, Moomba was the best. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Festival.
